title: [Control systems] Siemens security advisory (AV26-062)
description: On January 28, 2026, Siemens published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: RUGGEDCOM RST2428P (6GK6242-6PA00)  versions prior to V3.3
Siemens SCALANCE XCM-/XRM-/XCH-/XRH-300 family  versions prior to V3.3
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
